entry.title: Welcome
entry.summary: Hello everyone, I am happy to finally be able to present to you:
entry.content:
Hello everyone, I am happy to finally be able to present to you: My new website.

To start things off, here is an explaination what you can do on here:

  • Look up the documentation of all my assets for free.
  • Read the license for using the assets by clicking here
  • View the updates & current state of development on things here
  • Join the discord server by clicking at the logo on the top right corner.
  • Check my portfolio out by clicking on this link

If you want to support me, you can do that here.

That is basically it for now,
Thanks for using my products
~ Ruixey
